description:
Write a program that asks the user to input 4 different numbers.
Put the four variables in a list and randomly print one of the elements to the screen.
correct-program:
import random
numbers = [] for i in range(4): num = float(input(f"Enter number {i + 1}: ")) numbers.append(num)
selected_number = random.choice(numbers)
print("Randomly selected number: "+str(selected_number))
